org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering

Class RenderStrip

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.swisscheese.swisscheese.engine.rendering.RenderStrip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>

    public class RenderStrip
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>
    A class for rendering individual vertical scans of the screen. Will be ran by a thread-pool to improve performance.

    StripRenderer should ran some sort of thread dispatcher that loads the returned pixel strips into a pixels array.

    Since:
    2019-01-05, v0.5
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Alex Kalinins

    • Constructor Detail

      • RenderStrip

        public RenderStrip(StripRendererDispatcher parent,
                   int stripNumbers,
                   View view)
        Constructor for the StripRenderer
        Parameters:
        strip - the pixels array onto which the rendered pixels are loaded.
        stripNumbers - the number the strip (its x-location on the screen), starting count at 0;.
        view - the View object containing the information about the players point of view.
